data.text: @bigeby13 The littles bounce back faster than the parents. Lol! Glad you aren’t terribly sick!

@RidezWith Thanks Skye! She was over it really quickly and hasn't said anything else. She gave it to me and it took longer for me to get rid of it. I still feel some lingering cold symptoms that just won't leave. Nothing serious though.
@bigeby13 So sweet! Glad she’s feeling better! Hopefully you are too.
@jwpez It does. I never missed a run and I have played hockey twice now. I just have lingering cold like symptoms that just won't go away.

@IsenbargerMolly They were trying to get them to jump. She didn't do the best at that. But from the start of the lesson to the end she went from needing help to get up to her doing it all on her own. And I was very proud!
@jwpez She is. A couple days of fever was all for her. But she gave it to me and had to stay home longer. I'm better-ish now too.
@bigeby13 I hope she’s feeling all better
@bigeby13 How adorable! Leaps? She must be a natural! Proud dad moment for sure!
